response_data.title: Welding Safety & Quality
response_data.description: Training on WPS, PQR, and visual inspection

response_data.name: System Administrator
response_data.description: Full access to all modules and user management

response_data.name: HACCP Team Leader
response_data.description: Lead hazard analysis and maintain HACCP plan (non-approving)

response_data.name: QA Verifier
response_data.description: Perform HACCP verification activities and record verification logs

response_data.name: QA Manager
response_data.description: Manage documents, audits, HACCP, PRPs, CAPAs

response_data.name: Production Manager
response_data.description: View/edit HACCP and PRP logs, limited write access to NCs

response_data.name: Auditor
response_data.description: Access audit logs, initiate audits, raise NCs

response_data.name: Trainer
response_data.description: Assign and track training, update training matrix
